Description: You have failed to ensure that all the protective devices (namely 15 Thermal Relief Valves), which form part of the Liquified Natural Gas (LNG) pressure system and are included in the systemâ€™s scheme of examination for preventing danger, have been examined by a competent person within the intervals specified in the scheme, and failed to take all appropriate safety measures to prepare the system for examination, in that safe access or safe isolate of these valves was not provided.Mowi Scotland Limited - IN - IN/271021AT/1
